meanings.definition: To remove the loins or flank from (an animal)
meanings.sent1: The butcher eloined the meat from the cow.
meanings.sent2: The chef eloined the pork chops for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The farmer eloined the loins with precision.
meanings.sent4: She eloined the fish with expert skill.
meanings.sent5: The hunter eloined the deer swiftly.

meanings.definition: To cut or slice meat from the loins of an animal
meanings.sent1: He eloined the ribs from the pig.
meanings.sent2: The cook eloined the steak for grilling.
meanings.sent3: The chef eloined the loins for the barbecue.
meanings.sent4: She eloined the chicken with care.
meanings.sent5: The butcher eloined the lamb with ease.
